column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Next we ordered 2 BEEF TENDERLOIN & BLUE CHEESE
column2: 2 BEEF SKEWER W/ HORSERADISH AND RED ONIONS
column3: 2 BRAISED SHORT RIB W/ MASHED POTATOES
column4: and OCTOPUS. The beef tenderloin was fantastic...very juicy and medium rare (just how I like my beef). I did not particularly care for the beef skewer
column5: it tasted a bit charred and was not very juicy. The braised short rib was so tender and yummy...and the mashed potatoes weren't bad either. I didn't try the octopus (not a big seafood person).
